word:
Satan Will Cause God's People All the Trouble Possible--In the last days Satan will use all his powers against God's people, to afflict, to distress, to discourage them, to cause them all the trouble he possibly can.--Letter 93, 1900, p. 2. (To G. A. Irwin, July 3, 1900.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. May 20, 1982
